CHEWA-R.BK.summary: Chewathai Public Company Limited develops, rents, and sells residential projects in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Real Estate Business and Rental Business. The company develops and sells land, houses, and residence condominium projects. It also owns, develops, and rents ready-built sized factories. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Chewathai Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chartchewa Company Limited.

KWG-R.BK.long_name: King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
KWG-R.BK.summary: King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate and non-life insurance businesses in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Real Estate Business, Rental and Service Business, and Non-Life Insurance Business. The company develops residential housing projects, including condominium units, detached houses, and land; and provides property management and agency services, advertising and marketing services, and rental and other services for its office space, It is also involved in the construction and trading activities. The company was formerly known as Keppel Thai Properties Public Company Limited and changed its name to King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited in June 2016. King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
